alert.note: Alert for Tazewell (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 20 at 10:06AM EST until January 21 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM EST SUNDAY... ...WINTER STORM WARNING WILL EXPIRE AT 10 AM EST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 15 below zero. * WHERE...In Virginia, Tazewell County. In West Virginia, Mercer, Summers and Western Greenbrier Counties. * WHEN...Until 10 AM EST Sunday. * IMPACTS...The dangerously cold wind chills could result in hypothermia or frostbite if precautions are not taken. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Scattered snow showers will still be possible through this evening leading to slick roads. Continue to travel with caution.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.
